com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud

Class HUDGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.container.GUI
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud.HUDGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContainer<IFixedComponent>

    public class HUDGUI
extends GUI
    Extension of GUI to support HUD components.

      • HUDGUI

        public HUDGUI(IInterface inter,
              IDescriptionRenderer descriptionRenderer,
              IPopupPositioner descriptionPosition,
              IToggleable guiVisibility,
              IToggleable hudVisibility)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        inter - the IInterface to be used by the GUI
        descriptionRenderer - the IDescriptionRenderer used by the GUI
        descriptionPosition - the static IPopupPositioner to be used to position the descriptions
        guiVisibility - predicate for ClickGUI visibility
        hudVisibility - predicate for HUDEdior visibility

      • addHUDComponent

        public boolean addHUDComponent(IFixedComponent component,
                               IToggleable state,
                               Animation animation,
                               ITheme theme,
                               int border)
        Add a component wrapped in a HUDPanel as HUD component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to be added
        state - the boolean state to be passed to the theme
        animation - the animation to be used for opening and closing
        theme - the theme for the panel
        border - the component border
        Returns:
        whether the component was added
